statements: SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_inventory;
SELECT ingredient_name, supplier_name, quantity FROM pharmaceutical_inventory;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_inventory WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Pharmaceuticals';
SELECT ingredient_name, quantity FROM pharmaceutical_inventory ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT ingredient_name, supplier_name, quantity FROM pharmaceutical_inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_inventory ORDER BY expiration_date DESC, quantity ASC
SELECT ingredient_name, supplier_name, quantity FROM pharmaceutical_inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT ingredient_name, supplier_name, expiration_date FROM pharmaceutical_inventory WHERE quantity = 0 ORDER BY expiration_date
SELECT ingredient_name, supplier_name FROM pharmaceutical_inventory WHERE expiration_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT supplier_name, quantity FROM pharmaceutical_inventory WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'ABC%' ORDER BY quantity
SELECT * FROM ingredients
SELECT ingredient_name, unit_price, quantity FROM ingredients WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY unit_price DESC
SELECT ingredient_name, supplier_name, expiry_date FROM ingredients WHERE expiry_date > '2023-01-01'
SELECT product_name, manufacturer_name, quantity_available FROM products ORDER BY quantity_available DESC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE unit_cost < 50
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT ingredient_name, supplier_name FROM ingredients WHERE expiry_date < '2022-08-31';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity_available < 50 AND manufacturer_name = 'ABC Inc.';
SELECT product_name, manufacturer_name, quantity_available FROM products WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY quantity_available ASC;
SELECT ingredient_name, unit_price * quantity AS total_cost FROM ingredients WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 5.00 AND 10.00;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_ingredients LIMIT 5;
SELECT ingredient_name, quantity FROM pharmaceutical_ingredients WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM product_inventory ORDER BY expiry_date DESC;
SELECT manufacturer_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM product_inventory GROUP BY manufacturer_id;
SELECT center_name, location, capacity FROM distribution_centers WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_ingredients WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT ingredient_name, quantity, supplier_id FROM pharmaceutical_ingredients WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM product_inventory WHERE expiry_date < CURRENT_DATE AND quantity > 0;
SELECT center_name, location FROM distribution_centers ORDER BY location;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_ingredients WHERE supplier_id = 2 AND expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT location, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE expiry_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_id, quantity_produced, production_date FROM production ORDER BY production_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC, quantity ASC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, quantity, location FROM inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse A' ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM distribution ORDER BY location ASC

SELECT inventory.product_name, distribution.distributor_name FROM inventory JOIN distribution ON inventory.id = distribution.product_id WHERE distribution.location = 'Retail Store' ORDER BY inventory.product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_ingredients;
SELECT ingredient_name, quantity, unit_of_measurement FROM pharmaceutical_ingredients WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM product_inventory WHERE category = 'Medicine';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_number, email FROM supplier ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT center_name, location FROM distribution_center WHERE location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT * FROM supplier;
SELECT center_name, location FROM distribution_center ORDER BY center_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM product_inventory WHERE category = 'Medicine';
SELECT ingredient_name, unit_of_measurement FROM pharmaceutical_ingredients ORDER BY ingredient_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM supplier WHERE contact_number LIKE '555%';
